answers.answer: By the way this is my 2nd child. My first i was tiny so was my baby.she was 6lb2oz at 41wks. This time im being brought in for c-section at 38wks cos baby is far too big.

I am 26 weeks and before being pregnant I was 8stone now I am 10stone as long as your eating healthy and its the right things your eating you don't need to worry as that is what my midwife said at last app.

With my first, I gained 50 pounds, but started under weight. With my second I gained 40 I think. And with my third I gained only 11, but was working a full time very physical job eight months of it.... this pregnancy ive gained 8 so far and I'm 16+4.... so this will prob wind up being another over 30 pound gain... lol

question: I was 9stone, 10lb at the start.im now 35+5days and i am 11and a half stone. Im 5ft,3in and of small build. From the back u wouldnt know i was pregnant, from the front my belly is gigantic. The consultant said its a very large baby so im being, closely monitored.no diabetes. Im constantly hungry and do my best to eat a balanced diet, but its like i am getting bigger and bigger by the minute. Do u think already the 2and a half stone is too much weight or does that seem normal?
title: whats the average amount of weight u gain in pregnancy?
